detail_desc: Wide maxi dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and slim legs.

Short dress in a lightly crinkled viscose weave with decorative embroidery and a V-shaped opening with covered buttons and twisted, tasselled ties at the front. Long sleeves with inset trims and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.

Jeans in stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and straight legs with an extra leg pocket.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a square, elasticated neckline front and back. Smocked seam under the bust, and a smocked seam and wide flounce at the hem.

Oxford cotton shirt with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Chinos in a pima cotton weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks with decorative elasticated lace at the top.
Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse in softly draping silk with a round neck and short, flounced sleeves. Opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a straight-cut hem.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Elastic-trimmed hood with ears at the top, two concealed zips down the front for easy changing, and long sleeves with foldover mitts to keep the hands warm. Soft fleece lining made from recycled polyester.

High-waisted biker shorts in stretch fabric with reinforcement at the front and lower back to support a growing tummy. Lined gusset. The shorts are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Lace briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6 cm.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, pleats that create a draped effect and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Short puff sleeves with pleats at the shoulders, a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch viscose jersey with wide smocking at the top and short sleeves.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and buttons at the front. Seam at the waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in a jacquard-weave moire silk blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight, wide legs.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips. High waist with laser-cut edges, wide lace at the sides and a lined gusset.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3.8 cm, width of links approx. 2 cm, length of bracelet approx. 23 cm.
Short, sleeveless playsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Smocking at the back, seam at the waist and a frill trim at the top and hems. Lined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Mittens in woven fabric with narrow elastication at the wrists and a faux fur trim at the top. Size 2-6M without thumbs. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilation holes under the arms, ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. Tight fit. Size of chest pocket 10x17.5 cm.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a round neck and cut-out section at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch, high cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jacket in a patterned weave with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with an open section at the armholes. No fasteners.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Dressing gown in patterned satin with trims. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves, and concealed ties and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top to provide space for the tummy.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with creases.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck nursing top in soft viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short skirt in linen with a high waist, D-ring belt and buttons down the front. Large flap patch pockets at the front. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.

Padded parka in woven fabric. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, side pockets with a press-stud, a loose yoke at the back with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and imitation leather details. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with a turtleneck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with appliqués on the front, a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey containing some viscose with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Satin sash for a bride-to-be. Width 12 cm.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with motifs front and back, a small, ribbed, stand-up collar and jersey hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. Slipover in a textured knit with a V-neck.

Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Reversible bucket hat in cotton twill with one patterned side and one side in a solid colour. Embroidered eyelets at each side.

Blouse woven in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Skirt in soft velour with an elasticated waist and flare to the hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, an open chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a hood, button placket and an open chest pocket.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with rounded toes, a zip in one side and covered block heels. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Tops in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-shaped opening and buttons at the front. Short sleeves, and elasticated seam with a tasselled drawstring at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
V-neck top in woven fabric with lace details and wide shoulder straps.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long sleeves and roll edges.

Soft jersey pyjamas with a unique nursing feature. Top with long raglan sleeves, designed with a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Sweatpant bottoms with a wide waistband offering comfortable support, and cuffed hems. The waistband can be folded over post-pregnancy.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, trimmed neckline and short puff sleeves. Unlined.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight-cut blouse in airy cotton with beads and embroidery on the front. Double drawstrings with narrow ties and a V-shaped opening at the top, raglan balloon sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
V-neck blouse woven in a patterned viscose blend with buttons down the front and 3/4-length raglan, balloon sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and buttoned cuffs.

Bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and carabiner hook. One zipped mesh outer compartment and two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 22x29 cm.
Two pairs of longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short skirt in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
